Entries.default: The closer she nears, the faster her body dissolves. An arm's length from you, she opens her mouth to shout, but only a halting babble escapes.
The spirit lunges forward, arm raised to attack, but the movement seems to be too much for her fragile form, and she dissolves into a cloud of loose essence.

A nervous aumaua woman lingers beside a pedestal shaped like a conch. 

She startles at your approach and quickly touches some half-hidden object to the pedestal.

The flow of the water surrounding the pedestal abruptly changes directions, flooding the path behind it.

Satisfied the object has done its job, the woman starts toward you with long, determined strides.

Small bits of her already incorporeal form seem to flicker in and out of existence, as if she's slowly coming apart.
"You... not... enter...  I... keeper... relic... block... waters... Ondra's... guidance...!"
